lines.text: O mighty warrior of great fighting stock / Might I inquire to ask, ehh, what's up Doc?
[last lines]
Well, what did you expect in an opera? A happy ending?
I will do it with my spear and magic helmet!
Your spear and magic helmet?
Spear and magic helmet!
Magic helmet?
Magic helmet!

[aside to audience, cynical]
Magic helmet.

[to Ride of the Valkyries]
Kill da wabbit! Kill da wabbit! Kill da wabbit!
I'll kill the wabbit! Awise storm! North wind bwow! South wind bwow! Huwwicanes! Typhoons! Earthquakes! *Smog!*
Oh, Bwunehiwda, you're so wuvwee.
Yes I know it, I can't help it.
Yes, magic helmet and I'll give you a sample.
[summons lightning that strikes Bugs]
Bye-yeee!
[quickly runs off]
Dat was da wabbit!
Weturn, my wove / A wonging burns deep inside me.
Return, my love / I want you always beside me.
Wove wike ours must be...
Made for you and for me.
Return / Won't you return my love / For my love is yours.
Oh, what have I done? / I've killed the wabbit / Poor wittle bunny / Poor wittle wabbit.
